B

bringToBack() - Method in class controller.DrawController
Method that call command CommandBringToBack which bring some shape at the beginnig of the list of shapes if shape is not already at first position.
bringToFront() - Method in class controller.DrawController
Method that call command CommandBringToFront which bring some shape at the end of the list of shapes if shape is not already at last position.
btnAddCircleClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Circle.
btnAddHexagonClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Hexagon.
btnAddLineClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Line.
btnAddPointClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Point.
btnAddRectangleClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Rectangle.
btnAddSquareClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user click to add new Square.
btnDeleteShapeClicked() - Method in class controller.DrawController
Method is called when user want to delete some shape(s).
btnEdgeColorClicked() - Method in class controller.DrawController
User clicked to choose edge color, show { @inheritDoc JColorChooser}.
btnInteriorColorClicked() - Method in class controller.DrawController
User clicked to choose area color, show .
btnSelectShapeClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.DrawController
Called when user select some shape on a draw.
